section.p: The ship manoeuvres out of the harbour and on to the open sea. ‘We’ll have no trouble on this voyage,’ announces the captain. ‘I took the precaution of buying a charm of protection from Fortuity College in Dweomer.’
Whether it is the power of the charm or simple good luck, the journey is indeed without mishap and a few days later you dock at Dweomer. Turn to 100 in Over the Blood-Dark Sea.
